Posts.Content: Jan 31, 2013 02:07AM em2288 wrote: April, I'm so sorry to hear about your news. There is a such a wide support network (online and hopefully in the "real world" wherever you are too) for women fighting breast cancer, so hopefully that helps provide some comfort in your journey (as well as incredible solidarity). From what I've learned from my family members facing cancer is that you are much stronger than what you could ever imagine. I wish you all the best with your treatment plan.
Posts.Title: Path report is in - DCIS Grade 2 :( april485 FailedBelle
